undertitle.main: Calculate shapes by more simple way.

undertitle_short: Calculate shapes by more simple way.

initext: This is geometric calculator allow to calculate any parameter of a shape by any other parameters.
Just start to input any numbers in any fields, and if you see green light then you can tap the submit button to solve the shape.
You can calculate here any parameter by any combinations of initial parameters, and that makes this calculator unique.

modes.message_to_dark: Are you sure you want to change to dark mode?
modes.message_to_light: Are you sure you want to change to light mode?

warning_message.no_number: INAPROPRIATE CHARACTER(OR CHARACTERS) DETECTED. Input numbers only
warning_message.negative_number: NEGATIVE NUMBER(OR NUMBERS) DETECTED. Only input positive ones.
warning_message.impossible_shape: IMPOSSIBLE SHAPE, THE INPUT DATA CONTRADICTS EACH OTHER. Input different data.
